General.Name: Bina Puri Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Bina Puri Holdings Bhd, an investment holding company, operates as a contractor of earthworks, buildings, and road construction. The company operates in four segments: Construction, Property Development, Quarry, and Power Supply. It constructs roads and highways, bridges, interchanges, waterworks, and land reclamation projects; and commercial buildings, educational institutions, hotels, hospitals, government complexes, and residential projects. The company is also involved in quarry operations; and the manufacturing of construction materials. In addition, it engages in the development and management of properties; generation and supply of electricity through hydroelectricity and diesel-generated power plants; provision of project management consultancy services; and rental of service apartments. Further, the company operates as a concessionaire for KL-Kuala Selangor Expressway, which comprises 33km toll expressway; and commission agent. It has operations in Malaysia, as well as Brunei, Indonesia, Saudi Arabia, Pakistan, Thailand, the United Arab Emirates, Russia, Nepal, China, and India. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Selayang, Malaysia.
